response.overview: A man breaks into Naji's house and burns a collection of important documents. His friend, Ali Baba, tells him what happened. Naji dies in a mysterious incident and raises questions about the involvement of Ali Baba. Leila comes to discover the secrets of her cousin's death, and she knows Ali Baba, who discovers that he has more than one name. Three gangsters kidnap her, but Ali Baba saves her. Events are rising rapidly, with many surprises and secrets unfolding.
response.title: شيطان الجزيره
